bike.description: Demo 8 FSR M5 manipulated alloy, 8" travel, Magnesium link, asymetrical rear triangle, ISCG mount, 1.5" forged HT, cartridge bearing rear shock mount, rear derailleur protector

components.description: Specialized DHX RC4 coil 8.75x2.75" for Demo 8, rebound adj., High and low speed compression adj. and bottom out control, S:450, M:500, L:550
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
